briefTitle: DS-5565 Phase III Study for Renal Impairment in Japanese Subjects
officialTitle: A JAPANESE, PHASE 3, OPEN-LABEL, 14-WEEK STUDY OF DS-5565 IN PATIENTS WITH PAIN ASSOCIATED WITH DIABETIC PERIPHERAL NEUROPATHY WITH RENAL IMPAIRMENT OR POST-HERPETIC NEURALGIA WITH RENAL IMPAIRMENT
summary: Investigate the safety and efficacy of DS-5565 in Japanese subjects with Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathic Pain (DPNP) with renal impairment or Post-Herpetic Neuralgia (PHN) with renal impairment.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Average Daily Pain Score (ADPS) at Each Week
